column4: I am about to install Karmic. I understand that it will be faster to delete my partitions and start again with ext4. At the moment I have a separate home partition which is ext3. The reason I did this was to make backup easier and also so I could just hook up new distro versions to my existing home. Now, having a separate home partition is a bit limiting so can anyone suggest a better way to migrate my data across to karmic?
I have a second hard disk which I mount to another folder inside home
Cant remember but I remember I had to delete the partition and start again
